title: JavaScript.Info
description: Modern JavaScript Tutorial: simple, but detailed explanations with examples and tasks, including: closures, document and events, object oriented programming and more.

title: JavaScript Tutorial
description: JavaScript Tutorial provides you with many practical tutorials that help you learn JavaScript from scratch quickly and effectively.

title: JavaScript MDN Documentation
description: MDN Web Docs provides comprehensive, authoritative documentation for JavaScript, including tutorials, reference material, and examples.

title: JavaScript Tutorial - W3Schools
description: W3Schools offers a complete JavaScript tutorial, from basic to advanced topics, with plenty of examples and an interactive environment.

title: JavaScript Tutorial - Programiz
description: Learn JavaScript programming with Programiz through easy-to-follow tutorials and examples, suitable for beginners.

title: JavaScript Tutorial - Tutorialspoint
description: Tutorialspoint provides a broad overview of JavaScript, covering both fundamental programming concepts and deeper insights into JavaScript's capabilities.

title: JavaScript Tutorial - JavaTpoint
description: JavaTpoint offers comprehensive JavaScript tutorials that cover core language features, DOM manipulation, AJAX, and more, aimed at beginners and intermediate developers.

title: JavaScript Programming - GeeksforGeeks
description: GeeksforGeeks provides a series of articles on JavaScript that delve into the basics, algorithms, and data structures implemented in JavaScript.

title: JavaScript Tutorial - FreeCodeCamp
description: FreeCodeCamp offers an extensive free course on JavaScript as part of their full-stack curriculum, including exercises and projects.

title: JavaScript API - DevDocs.io
description: DevDocs.io combines multiple JavaScript API documentations in a fast, organized, and searchable interface.

title: Learn JavaScript in Y Minutes
description: Learn X in Y Minutes provides a quick tutorial that captures the essence of JavaScript, perfect for a quick syntax lookup or introduction.
